name: Paleozoic Anomalocaris
effectText:
3+ Level 2 monsters
Unaffected by other monsters' effects. Once per turn, if a Trap(s) is sent from your Spell & Trap Zone to the GY (except during the Damage Step): You can excavate the top card of your Deck, and if it is a Trap, add it to your hand. Otherwise, send it to the GY. Once per turn, if this card has a Trap as material (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 card on the field; destroy it.
